name: Vitals
description:
Here we present Vitals, our TriJam-144 entry.

This is our first attempt as a family at a game of any description. We went way over the allotted 3 hour limit and spent half the weekend trying to generate a Windows executable from pygame.

It's not great (!) so please be kind :)

HOW TO PLAY

Use SPACE to jump over the beats in the trace.

The BPM gradually ramps up over time.
